original_text: And the doors shall be shut in the streets, when the sound of the grinding is low, and he shall rise up at the voice of the bird, and all the daughters of musick shall be brought low;
korean_text: 길거리 문들이 닫혀질 것이며 맷돌 소리가 적어질 것이며 새의 소리로 말미암아 일어날 것이며 음악하는 여자들은 다 쇠하여질 것이며

sentences.original_text: And doors shall be shut in the streets
when the sound of grinding is low
and he shall rise up at the voice of the bird
and all the daughters of music shall be brought low
